name: A Circle Among Squares 3
description:
The Enemy Squares are still trying to Shot the Circle. With even better pausing abilities, the Circle makes a new challenge to mock them - survive to their onslaught until they just give up.

Survive for 1 minute in all 100 Levels. To do so, dodge Shots and don't let Enemies touch you. Enemies come in a variety of types and speeds. Time pauses whenever you stop inputting a direction, allowing one to choose your own pace. Failing a Level has no consequences.

Game Elements

You're the Circle. If hit by a Shot while unshielded or touched by an Enemy, you must retry the Level. Has the exclusive abilities of pausing the Game, collecting Shields and moving diagonally.

This is the floor. Anyone can move freely above it.

This Enemy shoots in 1 direction at medium speed. It can shoot in 8 directions.

This Enemy shoots in 1 direction at medium speed. It will always shoot at your current position.

This Enemy shoots in 1 direction at low speed. It can shoot in 8 directions.

This Enemy shoots in 4 directions at medium speed. It shoots vertically and horizontally.

This Enemy shoots in 4 directions at medium speed. It shoots diagonally.

This Enemy shoots in 1 direction at medium speed. It can shoot in 8 directions. The Shot gradually deaccelerates until it stops.

This Enemy shoots in 1 direction at medium speed. The Shot will change trajectory to your current position each second.

This Enemy shoots in 8 directions at medium speed. It shoots vertically, horizontally and diagonally.

This Enemy shoots in 1 direction at low speed. It can shoot in 8 directions. The Shot gradually accelerates to a very high speed.

This Enemy shoots in 1 direction at high speed. It can shoot in 8 directions.

This is the projectile all Enemies shoot.

Nothing can pass or destroy this brown square. Absorbs Shots.

Nothing can pass or destroy this purple square. Reflects Shots.

This is a Shield. Collect them in your current Level and you may take Shots without dying. Only the Circle can step over it.

This is a hole. It blocks movement but not Shots.

Features
  • 100 Levels, plus a Tutorial
  • 10 Types of Enemies
  • Enemies' speed may vary between slow and quick
  • Enemies may follow you or be static
  • Block, reflection and shield elements
  • Time pauses whenever you stop inputting a direction 
  • Diagonal movement exclusive to you
  • Change the game's appearance - 8 Text Fonts, 32 Text Colors, 32 Windowskins
  • In-game Achievements
  • Autosave
  • Minimalist design
  • Xbox Controller Support
Keyboard Controls
  • Start/Confirm = Space/Enter
  • Move = Up/Left/Down/Right, W/A/S/D, Numpad 8/4/2/6
  • Exit = Esc
Xbox Controller Controls
  • Start/Confirm = A
  • Move = Arrow Buttons/Left Analog Stick
  • Exit = Select
System Requirements
  • OS = Microsoft Windows 8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor = Intel Core i3-4340 or better
  • Memory = 4 GB RAM
  • GPU = Compatible OpenGL / VRAM 1GB or better
  • DirectX = Version 9.0 or better
  • Storage = 500 MB available space
  • Display = Recommended 1104x624 or better
